attributes.action: Get Megan Feather's Instagram Account Back
attributes.additional_details: All of Megan's followers love her and we want to help get her instagram account back up. We have the evidence and proof that she has the right to her instagram account. This page @instamodelzface posted photos of Megan without her permission and were against the Instagram guidelines however her account has still been deleted.
attributes.background: @megfeather instagram has been taken down due to reports of her bullying which are false. These reports are by an account called @instamodelzface who made false allegations about Megan. We want her account back, all she did was spread positivity and her joy of makeup to the world.
